thread.title: NAB confirms it will not fund Qld mine
thread.title_full: NAB confirms it will not fund Qld mine

title: NAB confirms it will not fund Qld mine
text:
NAB will not fund the controversial Carmichael coal mine slated for Queensland's Galilee Basin. 
Environmentalists have opposed the $16 billion project and work has stalled after a Federal Court ruling that there had been a loophole in Environment Minister Greg Hunt's approval. 
NAB would not confirm whether Indian mining giant Adani had asked it for cash but a spokesperson said environmental concerns were among criteria the lender looked at when deciding whether to fund projects. 
The spokesperson said "NAB is not involved and has no plans to be involved in any financing for the Carmichael coal mine". @YahooNZBusiness on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook NAB confirms it will not fund Qld mine AAP
